reason: Node 1.3.1 has no declared dependencies, but its verification relies on: (1) the F-matrix from node 1.1.3, (2) the projector P_1^{(2)} from node 1.2.6, (3) the tube algebra formula from node 1.2.1, and (4) the kernel analysis (lines 273-274 of the paper) which is related to node 1.3.3. These should be listed as explicit dependencies for completeness.
